lead_paragraph: Ondrej Palat and Anton Stralman both scored twice, Tyler Johnson had a goal and two assists and the Tampa Bay Lightning beat the Pittsburgh Penguins 6-3 on Friday night for their eighth consecutive home win.

headline.print_headline: Palat, Stralman Lead Lightning Past Penguins 6-3
headline.main: Palat, Stralman Lead Lightning Past Penguins 6-3

snippet: Ondrej Palat and Anton Stralman both scored twice, Tyler Johnson had a goal and two assists and the Tampa Bay Lightning beat the Pittsburgh Penguins 6-3 on Friday night for their eighth consecutive home win....
